data.meta_description: Hands-on Art Director/Graphic Designer with exceptional skill in conceptualization. Specializing in initiating creative concepts and designing award winning advertising and marketing communications in print and television while ensuring brand consistency and building and maintaining client relationships. Taking projects from concept to client presentation and pre-production through post production. Projects range from print and television campaigns to a gamut of point-of-purchase and collateral materials for clients such as AT&T, USA Network, Claritin, Crestor, Cuisinarts and ADT Home Security. Studied Advertising and Graphic Design at the School of Visual Arts receiving a BFA with honors and The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement. Numerous Advertising Awards. Art Directors Club of NY, The One Show, Art Directors Club of NJ including Best-in-Show. Clio, 1st place Gannet NJ Outdoor Competition, Adweeks - Best of the Best and Stephen F. Kelly Award finalist. Aegis Insurance, CTI Group/Equity Investments • Food: Cuisinarts, Hebrew National, Lea & Perrins, Nabisco, The American Cafe Restaurants • Pharmaceutical: Claritin, Clarinex, Elidel, Famvir; Crestor; J&J Pharma • Publishing: Warner Books, Random House, Times Books, Town & Country Magazine • Toys: LJN Toys, Tyco Toys • Travel & Tourism: New Jersey Tourism, New Jersey State Fair, Mt Creek Ski Resort & Water Park, Sussex Skyhawks and NJ Jackals Baseball Clubs • Other: AT&T, Cosmepak, ADT Home Security, Formica Brand Laminate, Wilkinson Silver Sword, TM Brennan Contractors, Karcher Power Washers, Paper Mate Pens EDUCATION • BFA with honors, The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement, School of Visual Arts, NY • Two years liberal arts studies at Fairleigh Dickinson University, Madison NJ CONTACT INFO Bill Kopp 86 Canfield Avenue Mine Hill, NJ 07803 973.303.0865 billkopp@aol.com Return to Kopp Blogsite: billkopp.blogspot.com/
data.text:
Hands-on Art Director/Graphic Designer with exceptional skill in conceptualization. Specializing in initiating creative concepts and designing award winning advertising and marketing communications in print and television while ensuring brand consistency and building and maintaining client relationships.

Taking projects from concept to client presentation and pre-production through post production. Projects range from print and television campaigns to a gamut of point-of-purchase and collateral materials for clients such as AT&T, USA Network, Claritin, Crestor, Cuisinarts and ADT Home Security.

Studied Advertising and Graphic Design at the School of Visual Arts receiving a BFA with honors and The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement.

Numerous Advertising Awards. Art Directors Club of NY, The One Show, Art Directors Club of NJ including Best-in-Show. Clio, 1st place Gannet NJ Outdoor Competition, Adweeks - Best of the Best and Stephen F. Kelly Award finalist.

TOOLS

• Adobe CS5: PhotoShop, InDesign, Illustrator, ImageReady, iMovie

• QuarkXPress

EXPERIENCE

• Freelance Art Director/Designer: Lars & Associates, Hibernia, NJ

• Senior Art Director/Designer: Gravity DesignWorks, Newton, NJ

• Group Art Supervisor: The Quantum Group a division of CommonHealth, Parsippany, NJ

• Associate Creative Director: Poppe Tyson, NJ

• Associate Creative Director: Della Femina-McNamee, NY

• Senior Art Director: McCann-Erickson, NY

• Art Director: Geers Gross/Kurtz & Tarlow, NY

CLIENT LIST

• Airlines: Lufthansa Airlines, Varig Brazilian Airlines

• B2B: Newport News Shipbuilding, NEIC, Drew Industrial, PSE&G

• Broadcast: USA Network, Financial News Network, WNTI 91.9FM, Clear Channel WNNJ 103.7FM

• Financial: Lincoln Savings Bank, Lincoln Private Bank. Aegis Insurance, CTI Group/Equity Investments

• Food: Cuisinarts, Hebrew National, Lea & Perrins, Nabisco, The American Cafe Restaurants

• Pharmaceutical: Claritin, Clarinex, Elidel, Famvir; Crestor; J&J Pharma

• Publishing: Warner Books, Random House, Times Books, Town & Country Magazine

• Toys: LJN Toys, Tyco Toys

• Travel & Tourism: New Jersey Tourism, New Jersey State Fair, Mt Creek Ski Resort & Water Park, Sussex Skyhawks and NJ Jackals Baseball Clubs

• Other: AT&T, Cosmepak, ADT Home Security, Formica Brand Laminate, Wilkinson Silver Sword,

TM Brennan Contractors, Karcher Power Washers, Paper Mate Pens

EDUCATION

• BFA with honors, The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement, School of Visual Arts, NY

• Two years liberal arts studies at Fairleigh Dickinson University, Madison NJ

CONTACT INFO

Bill Kopp

86 Canfield Avenue

Mine Hill, NJ 07803

973.303.0865

billkopp@aol.com
